detail_desc: Wide, satin-covered Alice band.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Platform mules with a braided jute trim around the soles and a wide, twisted foot strap. Platform front approx. 2 cm, heel 4 cm.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Dress in an airy patterned weave with a V-neck with covered buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. Gathered, asymmetric seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif in reversible sequins on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Fabric-covered hair elastics. Two patterned, three in solid colour.

Quilted shirt jacket in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Lined.
Wide pyjama bottoms in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the leg, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a lightweight weave with concealed front pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with a seam and decorative gathers at the knees. Lacing detail at the hem.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small, decorative metal pendant.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back of the neck, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with flounces. Elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Checked shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Long top in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, visible seams at the top and back and a rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer-style jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Double-layered top in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered section at the front. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with gentle gathers and buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, and seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a narrow racer back. Muscle Fit - a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Slip-on trainers with elastication and a decoration at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets with a flap. 3/4-length, gently gathered sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Hat in braided paper straw with ears on top, embroidery and sequins on the front and a floral grosgrain band.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Metal ring in the shape of a skull.

Sports tights in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waist panel. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Nylon laptop case with a chunky zip, one outer compartment and two inner compartments in big hole mesh. Size 1x24x33 cm. Fits laptops up to 13”.
Calf-length pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Moulded fancy dress mask in velvet with a print motif on the front, decorative fabric flowers and an elastic strap at the back.
Non-wired push-up bra top in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Sandals in imitation leather with adjustable straps, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a soft viscose weave with flounces. Wrapover front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and ties at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and ties at the hem.

Short cold shoulder dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short flounced sleeves that are elasticated at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Boxy-style top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hair elastic with large plastic beads. No metal clip.
Long-sleeved top in soft fleece with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly, short slit at the front and cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless. straight-cut top in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the hem.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Padded, velour-covered Alice band with decorative sparkly stones on top.
Long earrings made of metal links decorated with sparkly stones. Length approx. 9 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. T-shirt with lapped shoulders. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Over-the-knee socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short, straight-cut dungaree dress in jacquard-patterned jersey with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
